resources.string: On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how positive and negative have you felt this morning?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how positive and negative have you felt this afternoon?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how positive and negative have you felt this evening?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how positive and negative have you felt tonight?
Select each word that describes how you\'ve felt this morning.
Select each word that describes how you\'ve felt this afternoon.
Select each word that describes how you\'ve felt this evening.
Select each word that describes how you\'ve felt tonight.
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following this morning?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following this afternoon?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following this evening?
On a scale of 0 (NOT AT ALL) to 5 (VERY MUCH), how strongly have you felt each of the following tonight?
